item.title: Three Republican-led states to send hundreds of National Guard troops to Washington
item.description: West Virginia said it was deploying 300 to 400 Guard troops, while South Carolina pledged 200 and Ohio says it will send 150 in the coming days, marking a significant escalation of the federal intervention.

item.title: Government forces Air Canada flight attendants back to work, into arbitration
item.description: Canada's government forced Air Canada and its striking flight attendants back to work and into arbitration Saturday after a work stoppage stranded more than 100,000 travelers around the world.
